string-array.name: help_content1
string-array.item: Welcome Screen – Touch the upper left icon to start.

string-array.name: help_content2
string-array.item: Main Menu - This shows the basic options the user can use. This includes Camera, Plant List, About this app, Open Source Licenses.
Camera – Allows you to access the phone’s camera to take pictures for recognition.
Plant List – Allows you to view the list of plant recognized by this application.
About this App – Informs you about the applications features, help section and update section.
Open Source Licenses – Licenses of the libraries used for making this application.

string-array.name: help_content3
string-array.item: This shows the list of herbal plants recognized by the application in list view. This is the default view for smart phones.
Toggle upper right button to change view.

string-array.name: help_content4
string-array.item: This shows the list of herbal plants recognized by the application in grid view. This is the default view for tablets.
Toggle upper right button to change view.

string-array.name: help_content5
string-array.item: This is the detailed view of every plant in the list. It includes the plant’s pictures, name, scientific name, common name, vernacular name, properties, usage, and availability.
Web search button is available to give more information about the plant selected.

string-array.name: help_content6
string-array.item: This shows the expanded version of the detailed view of every plant. When you click on the main list, it will show all the items under that list.

string-array.name: help_content7
string-array.item: When you click on the picture, you will see the full view of the image. You can also zoom it in or out for a better view of the image.

string-array.name: help_content8
string-array.item: This application is also capable of searching for specific plant in the list. Upon entering your query, the list automatically lists all matching entries.

string-array.name: help_content9
string-array.item: An example of using the search functionality. The user typed in “sa”, the application then displays the list of plants that contains with “sa”. Search basis is upon the plant’s name OR plant’s common name.
